sentence.Network_en: They met and fell in love in a supermarket, of all places.

sentence.Network_en: The green trees in the neighbouring village were shrouded in a mist.
sentence.Network_cn: 近村的绿树,都笼在湿烟里.

sentence.Network_en: A boy bathes in a mist - shrouded river in Nanyung, Myanmar ( Burma ).
sentence.Network_cn: 一个男孩在 缅甸 南云一条烟雾缭绕的河里洗澡.

means.word_mean: 1. tropical American passion flower with finely dissected bracts; stems malodorous when crushed
2. chickweed with hairy silver-gray leaves and rather large white flowers
3. European garden plant having finely cut leaves and white or pale blue flowers
